column4: is it possible to have multiple bonded interfaces (eg bond0 = eth0 & eth2 bond1 = eth1 & eth3)?
don't want to bridge - want to bond / team. Have one bond interface up - now am trying to get the second online and am having problems
ok - will try it manually although already have bond0 setup and working - now need bond1 on different subnet
should be there automatically. Or File Close instead of Quit. Or install the PPA version which should support it from the close toolbar button
all I get from the first ifconfig command is bond1: ERROR while getting interface flasgs: no such device
setup network interfaces or virtual interfaces so they match your IP/subnet settings first
so I need to setup say eth2 to use the subnet I want?
pretty cool stuff, let me know when you have bonded :)
no luck yet. Weird as bond0 was realy easy to setup bond1 is being a total pita
subnet issue maybe. make sure you take the bonds down before bonding up again
Copy and init script as bonding, then you can do "bonding up/down"
ok giving up for today - will try again tomorrow
